works.title: Hermorsuffer Website
works.desc: My side project that I developed during my spare time to improve my React.js skills and to create a practical application that can help people manage their daily tasks. The app features an interactive user interface, which I built using React.js, a popular JavaScript library known for its simplicity and flexibility.

works.title: Manage Landing Page | React.js
works.desc: This Project was a valuable learning experience that allowed me to develop my skills in website layout design and implementation using React.js. The project involved creating a landing page for a fictitious product, with a focus on creating an engaging and visually appealing layout that would attract and retain user attention.

works.title: Shortly URL Shortener App
works.desc: The URL Shortener App is a side project that I developed with the aim of learning more about public APIs. The app allows users to input long URLs and generate a shortened URL using a public API. This makes it convenient for users to share links without having to type out long URLs.

works.title: Weather App
works.desc: I developed this app to help people easily access the latest weather information for cities in Turkey. To achieve this, I used the Axios JavaScript library, which allowed me to easily fetch the location data for various cities in Turkey using an external API.
